treatment-md.title: Schizomyia paederiae Elsayed, Yukawa & Tokuda, 2018, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: A taxonomic revision and molecular phylogeny of the eastern Palearctic species of the genera Schizomyia Kieffer and Asteralobia Kovalev (Diptera, Cecidomyiidae, Asphondyliini), with descriptions of five new species of Schizomyia from Japan
